title: Minecraft 主机版 TU58/1.57/1.60/Patch 28/Patch 8 发布
author: a1294790523
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a1294790523 于 2017-11-4 13:46 编辑 

主机版即Xbox 360，Xbox One版，PlayStation 3/4/Vita版，WiiU版，Switch版，由4J Studios为Mojang开发。 迎接新的正式版吧！ 转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。  原文链接Added Stranger Things Skin Pack.添加了《怪奇物语》皮肤包Add a time-limited Halloween Tumble arena, including specially themed layers!添加了包括特殊主题关卡的限时万圣节Tumble竞技场！Added the "Custom" game type to the Battle Mini Game with a huge variety of new settings, including:添加了“自定义”游戏类型到Battle小游戏，新设置变化很大，包括：
Enable choosing the number of lives per round that each player gets.可以设置每一轮玩家获得的生命数。Enable choosing the number of rounds to play before the winner is selected.可以设置在选出获胜者之前的游戏轮数。Enable forcing map size.可以设置限制游戏区域时的地图大小。A variety of different options to manage how players heal, and how quickly they get hungry.可以使用多种不同的设置来管理玩家的治疗方式以及快速获得饥饿的方式。Added the No Armor item set to Custom Battle games, an item set designed to keep the combat fast-paced and exciting.在自定义Battle游戏中添加了无护甲物品的设置，这类物品的属性会被设计成让战斗保持快节奏和刺激的样子。Added the High Power item set to Custom Battle games, allowing you to play Battle with some of the most powerful items in Minecraft!在自定义Battle游戏中添加了强力物品的设置，这允许你带着在Minecraft里的一些强力物品来玩Battle游戏。Added the Decayed item set to Custom Battle games; every item breaks after a few uses, so you'll need to keep moving.在自定义Battle 游戏中添加了腐朽物品的设置，每个物品都会在使用几次后损坏，所以你需要不停地移动。Added the Food Central item set to Custom Battle games. Food is only found in the centre chests, and equipment only in the outer chests.在自定义Battle 游戏中添加了中心点物品是食物的设置。食物只能在中心的箱子中找到，而装备只能在外围的箱子中找到。
Added the "Custom" game type to Tumble Mini Game with a huge variety of new settings, including:添加了“自定义“游戏类型到Tumble小游戏，新设置变化很大，包括：
Enable choosing the number of lives per round that each player gets.可以设置每一轮玩家获得的生命数。Enable choosing the number of layers, and controlling the size of the layers.可以设置层数以及控制每一层的大小。Added Fireworks as a usable weapon in Custom Tumble games.在自定义Tumble游戏中烟花被作为可用的武器被加入。Added Splash Potions of Levitation as a usable weapon in Custom Tumble games.在自定义Tumble游戏中喷溅型飘浮药水被作为可用的武器被加入。Added Spectator Participation to Custom Tumble games!在自定义Tumble游戏中添加了可参与的旁观者！
Players can now spectate Battle and Tumble Mini Games as a Parrot, Vex, or floating head.玩家现在可以作为鹦鹉、恼鬼或飞着的头旁观Battle和Tumble小游戏.
  外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪 
Mojang官方博客（英文）4JStudios的Twitter（英文，内地需翻墙）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）官方更新日志（英文）英语 Minecraft Wiki的Console Edition version history页面（英文，更新条目详细）中文 Minecraft Wiki的主机版版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细）

replies.author: O为何不可
replies.txt_content: 主机版太多bug了，动物突然消失，怪物太少，几百小时了，一只僵尸村民都没碰到过，刷率简直感人
